body: When an iron priest channels energy to heal or harm living creatures, she heals or harms constructs with the clockwork or robot subtypes as well. Constructs without those subtypes are also affected, but gain only half the normal amount of healing or take only half the normal amount of damage, as appropriate. An iron priest cannot harm or heal undead with channel energy. This ability alters channel energy.
name: Channel Energy
url: pfsrd://Technology Guide/Rules/Technology in the world/Archtypes/Technology-Themed Archetypes/Iron Priest/Channel Energy
